thread.title: Good experience
thread.title_full: Good experience - Review of Hotel Eclat Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: shany_steinmetz
title: Good experience
text: It is a really good experience staying at Hotel Ã©clat Beijing,my friend recommended this hotel to me because it's very unique.the room is very clean the view is also good,the people are very kind,I have talk with manager Chris during the afternoon tea time,he introduced hotel and surrounding for me,it was very nice have the knowledge about hotel,I will recommend this hotel to my other friends.
